April 18, 1949 D City of Leicester Brass Band Festival (Fourth Section)
City of Leicester Brass Band Festival (Fourth Section) 40 Test Piece Contest City of Leicester Brass Band Festival city-of-leicester-brass-band-festival-4th-section
The Mountain Chief
YMCA Hall, Granby Street, Leicester Prizes - 1st £10, 2nd £7, 3rd £5, 4th £3. 22nd annual contest. 19 bands competed.
